diff_hunk:
@@ -39,8 +39,10 @@ def set_training(model, mode):
         if old_mode != mode:
             model.train(old_mode)
 
+# The global variable indicates whether aten mode is on

body:
Make this private with an underscore.

If you're up for it, let's also consider manually propagating the variable through now. That involves adding a parameter to `export` for this, and then plumbing it to the invocation of `run_symbolic_function`. I'd recommend removing the extra overloads on `export`, so you only have to edit one.

body_text:
Make this private with an underscore.
If you're up for it, let's also consider manually propagating the variable through now. That involves adding a parameter to export for this, and then plumbing it to the invocation of run_symbolic_function. I'd recommend removing the extra overloads on export, so you only have to edit one.
